mean_cn: n. 非凡的才智；才华出众的人
mean_en: the ability to think in a logical way and understand things, especially at an advanced level; your mind
sentence: His classmates were all surprised by his considerable intellect.
sentence_trans: 同学们对他过人的智力感到惊讶。
word_etyma: intel在…中间 ＋ lect选择，收集 → 在中间选出的人 → intellect智者
